auth.usernameError: Username must be at least of 4 characters
auth.passwordError: Password must be at least of 6 characters
auth.loginMessage: Use Twitter, Slack, Discord, or your primary email address to login or sign up for bip easily.
auth.emailMessage: We’ll confirm if you already have an account on bip, and help create one if you don’t.
auth.passwordMessage: Enter the password associated with this account or request for a login One-time password.
auth.OtpMessage: An OTP has been sent to your Email.
auth.agreeText: By continuing, you agree to bip’s
auth.showcase: Showcase your work to the world
auth.onboard: Onboard your existing community in a single click
auth.autoSyncRoles: Auto-sync roles and control access based on them
auth.captureImportant: Capture important message and drop them into documents
auth.getNotified: Get notified of updates in DMs
auth.createAndCollaborate: Create and collaborate with git enabled documents
auth.nonDevelopers: Non-developers find git complicated. We make it simple so anyone can use it.
auth.allowAnyone: Allow anyone to contribute by sending a merge / publish request
auth.everyContribution: Every contribution is attributed so people can build their proof of work
auth.engageYourFans: Engage your fans with our social features
auth.writingAndReading: Writing and reading documents is a big ask. We make it easy!
auth.leaderboardToMotivate: Leaderboard to motivate your community to contribute
auth.shareImportant: Share important snippets as a feed with Posts
auth.daosDesc: Allow anyone to contribute in permission-less way and keep track of top contributors
auth.nicheCommunitiesDesc: Create wikis and build a permanent knowledge repo for your community, with your community
auth.learningDesc: Research and learn in public, whether it's about your latest investment or a budding technology
auth.name: Name

onboarding.description: A studio is where the knowledge base of you community resides. Connect a Slack workspace or Discord server to set up your studio automatically on bip.
onboarding.workspaceDescription: A workspace is where the knowledge base of you community resides. Connect a Slack workspace or Discord server to set up your workspace automatically on bip.

studioFeedOnboarding.title: This is your studio feed
studioFeedOnboarding.description: This feed is only for your studio members. Whatever you share here would be restricted to your studio members.

workspaceFeedOnboarding.title: This is your workspace feed
workspaceFeedOnboarding.decsription: This feed is only for your workspace members. Whatever you share here would be restricted to your workspace members.

exploreOnboarding.title: Find Workspaces from Across World
exploreOnboarding.description: Find Workspaces from Across The World

userFeedOnboarding.title: This is your personalized feed
userFeedOnboarding.description: As you join more studios, you will see more posts here. Feel free to post discussions, questions and announcements to your feed.
userFeedOnboarding.workspaceDescription: As you join more workspaces, you will see more posts here. Feel free to post discussions, questions and announcements to your feed.
userFeedOnboarding.subtext: Mention members in your post and have fun!

rightrail.anyoneEditDescription: Can edit and send merge requests
rightrail.anyonePrivateDescription: Only those with access can open

billing.limitExceededWarning: Private canvas limit exceeded, please subscribe to a plan. Else new canvases will go public in 24 hours
billing.canvasLimitExceededP1: You have exceeded the 25 private canvas limit of the free plan.Newly published canvases will be made public in 24 hours. Upgrade now to keep them private!

chooseWorkspace.discord: Choose a workspace to connect with your Discord server

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.joinMessage: This allows users to join workspace directly
workspace.deleteAlert: This action is irreversible and may cause significant data loss
workspace.confirmRemoveMember: They would no longer have access to the workspace and canvasses.
workspace.problemCreatingWorkspace: Problem while creating workspace. please try after sometime
workspace.placeholder: A few words about the workspace. Max characters 300...
workspace.flashMessage: We have created this workspace for you. Start creating your Wiki now.
workspace.deleteConfirmationDialog: You are going to delete workspace!

landing.heading: Wiki for your community
landing.subHeading: Bring your Discord and Slack communities with one click and collaborate asynchronously on documents.
landing.testimonialsHeading: Users are happy they choose bip
landing.testimonialSubHeading: See what they are saying about us
landing.faqsHeading: Here are some of the questions our users have asked
landing.faqsSubHeading: If you did not find what you were looking for, you can send us an email or join our Discord server for faster support.
landing.communityCardHeading: Join our community product demos. See how bip can help your community
landing.communityCardSubHeading: Create your workspace and build with your community

pricingPage.heading: Plans that cater to communities of any size!
